---
title: "Moon Phase Calendar"
author: "Dan Kelley"
---

This website shows the moon phase for the persent month, as predicted for the
sky at Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada.  Note that the diagrams do not indicate
the tilt of the arc.

R code to create this graph and others like it is provided in an R script named
`calendar_web.R` that may be found at https://github.com/dankelley/sunmoon,
along with related items.

Here are some other links that might be of interest:

* http://emit.phys.ocean.dal.ca/~kelley/sunmoon shows the paths of the sun and
the moon for the present day, at Halifax.
* http://emit.phys.ocean.dal.ca/~kelley/analemma shows an analemma for Halifax.
* http://emit.phys.ocean.dal.ca/~kelley/sunrise_angle is a site showing sunrise
and sunset glare maps for Halifax.
